data.name: 单品热卖
data.template:
{
    "attribute": {
        "productId": "0",
        "name": "单品热卖"
    },
    "references": [
        {
            "referVarType": "main",
            "expressions": [
                {
                    "key": "title",
                    "alias": "标题",
                    "validation": {
                        "minLen": 16,
                        "maxLen": 32,
                        "required": true,
                        "illegalChars": ""
                    },
                    "tips": "标题长度16到32个字符",
                    "inputType": "text",
                    "varType": "title",
                    "wildcard": "[{\"key\": \"normal\",\"value\": \"{@}\"},{\"key\":\"region\",\"value\":\"{#region#}\"}]",
                    "isShowKey": true
                },
                {
                    "key": "desc_text",
                    "alias": "描述",
                    "validation": {
                        "minLen": 16,
                        "maxLen": 136,
                        "required": true
                    },
                    "tips": "长度16到136个字符",
                    "inputType": "text",
                    "varType": "text",
                    "wildcard": "[{\"key\": \"normal\",\"value\": \"{@}\"},{\"key\":\"region\",\"value\":\"{#region#}\"}]",
                    "isShowKey": true
                },
                {
                    "key": "show_url",
                    "alias": "显示网址",
                    "validation": {
                        "minLen": 1,
                        "maxLen": 36,
                        "required": true,
                        "illegalChars": "",
                        "type": "domainCheck"
                    },
                    "tips": "请填写显示网址，帐号注册域名或子域名",
                    "inputType": "text",
                    "varType": "url",
                    "secondaryVarType": "show",
                    "isShowKey": true
                },
                {
                    "key": "target_url",
                    "alias": "目标网址",
                    "validation": {
                        "minLen": 1,
                        "maxLen": 1024,
                        "required": true,
                        "illegalChars": "",
                        "type": "domainCheck"
                    },
                    "tips": "http(s)开头，帐号注册域名或子域名",
                    "inputType": "text",
                    "varType": "url",
                    "secondaryVarType": "target",
                    "isShowKey": false
                },
                {
                    "key": "1_tips",
                    "value": "图片，使用产品库中“image”字段；商品名称，使用产品库中“name”字段；商品品牌，使用产品库中“brand”字段；商品落地页，使用产品库中“targetUrl”字段",
                    "style": "",
                    "inputType": "static_text",
                    "varType":"rawText"
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "referVarType": "product",
            "index": 1,
            "size": 1,
            "expressions": [
                {
                    "key": "1_pic_img",
                    "alias": "图片1",
                    "validation": {
                        "suffixes": [
                            "jpg",
                            "jpeg",
                            "png"
                        ],
                        "maxSize": 256,
                        "width": 120,
                        "height": 120,
                        "required": true
                    },
                    "tips": "",
                    "inputType": "hidden",
                    "varType": "image",
                    "isShowKey": false,
                    "referKey": "images",
                    "value": "https://e.uc.cn/hcfs/web/fs/LMTg0MTE0OTk3Njc5MzI4MzZfOTIyMzM3MDUzNzA4Njg0Mjk2NgTA/mediaimg/5/adstyle/adstyle_5_d9420cb68cf2e532b4536cc37438d6d1.jpg"
                },
                {
                    "key": "1_name_h1",
                    "alias": "商品名称1",
                    "validation": {
                        "required": true,
                        "illegalChars": ""
                    },
                    "tips": "",
                    "inputType": "hidden",
                    "varType": "h1",
                    "isShowKey": false,
                    "referKey": "name",
                    "value": "单品热卖"
                },
                {
                    "key": "1_brand_h1",
                    "alias": "商品品牌1",
                    "validation": {
                        "required": true,
                        "illegalChars": ""
                    },
                    "tips": "",
                    "inputType": "hidden",
                    "varType": "h1",
                    "isShowKey": false,
                    "referKey": "brand",
                    "value": "神马搜索"
                },
                {
                    "key": "1_subpath_url",
                    "alias": "商品目标网址1",
                    "validation": {
                        "required": true,
                        "illegalChars": "",
                        "type": "domainCheck"
                    },
                    "tips": "",
                    "inputType": "hidden",
                    "varType": "url",
                    "secondaryVarType": "target",
                    "isShowKey": false,
                    "referKey": "targetUrl",
                    "value": "http://e.sm.cn"
                },
                {
                    "key": "feed_condition",
                    "alias": "feed筛选条件",
                    "validation": {},
                    "tips": "",
                    "inputType": "selected_feed",
                    "varType": "condition",
                    "isShowKey": false
                },
				
                {
                    "key": "filter_condition",
                    "alias": "商品筛选条件",
                    "validation": {},
                    "tips": "",
                    "inputType": "selected_rules",
                    "varType": "condition",
                    "isShowKey": false
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
data.element: teList":[]},"type":"domainCheck"},"value":"http://e.sm.cn","varType":"url"},{"alias":"feed筛选条件","inputType":"selected_feed","key":"feed_condition","showKey":false,"tips":"","validation":{"duration":0,"required":false,"resolution":{"ratio":"","whiteList":[]}},"value":"","varType":"condition"},{"alias":"商品筛选条件","inputType":"selected_rules","key":"filter_condition","showKey":false,"tips":"","validation":{"duration":0,"required":false,"resolution":{"ratio":"","whiteList":[]}},"value":"","varType":"condition"}],"index":1,"referVarType":"product","size":1}]
